text: The 15 best spots for margaritas in St. Louis Feb 24, 2017, 12:35pm CST Industries & Tags Katlyn Keller Research Director St. Louis Business Journal Share Katlyn Keller Research Director St. Louis Business Journal Bizspace Spotlight 15 photos 1. Chava's Mexican Restaurant in Soulard has the best margaritas in St. Louis, according… more Wednesday, Feb. 22 was national margarita day. But now it's Friday, so we know you're looking for a place to go for happy hour, and maybe some margaritas. Check out the gallery below to see the 15 best spots to get a margarita in St. Louis, according to a ranking by Foursquare . 15 photos 1. Chava's Mexican Restaurant in Soulard has the best margaritas in St. Louis, according… more St. Louis city is definitely the hot spot for authentic Mexican cuisine and margaritas, with South City dominating the list, although favorites like Mission Taco and Rosalita's also made an appearance. Katlyn Keller is List researcher. Bizspace Spotlight
